text: thats really cool
A file was shared
"get off the couch, Human, and go buy more milk"
I remain unclear how refrigerators that notify you about milk became the defult example for "the future"
but its ALWAYS the example
is there a milk notification crisis Im unaware of?
well they would use beer, but they'd have to slap a "please drink responsibly" sticker everywhere
I imagine this guy in the future complaining that he's been wanting to quit milk for 5 years but he can't find the setting to turn off milk delivery.
we used to talk about sending people to the moon for vacation. Now the most we can aim for is prompt milk notifications
and even then, I'm pretty sure the first smart milk fridge I heard about was in the mid-90s
Yes, where is my flying car Science?
they'll get to flying cars just as soon as they figure out milk notifications
late to the party, but im glad you guys reminded me to buy milk
there will also come a time in the future when fridges have reminded people to buy milk more than people talking about fridges reminding people to buy milk reminds people to buy milk
<@U026PT0D7>: and on that day, i will forget
also technically milk hasn't been a wearable since the 80's
so this is all O/T
where does gogurt fit in the mix here? Wearable or not?
definitely mobile
oh clearly mobile
